# MEN'S FASHION
## _Ecommerce Website_

[![N|Solid](data:image/png;base64,)]()

This is a README file for an e-commerce website, which provides an online platform for buying and selling products.

## Table of Contents
- Futures
- Technologies Used
- Productive project location
- Contributing- Contact Information

## Futures
- User Registration: Users can create an account on the website by providing their personal information such as name, email, and password.

- Product Catalog: The website displays a catalog of products available for purchase, organized into categories and searchable by keywords.

- Shopping Cart: Users can add products to their shopping cart and view the contents of their cart. They can also update quantities, remove products, and proceed to checkout.

- Checkout Process: The website provides a secure checkout process, where users can enter their shipping and billing information, choose a payment method, and place an order.

- Order History: Users can view their order history, including details of past purchases, tracking information, and order status.

- User Authentication: The website ensures user authentication and authorization, requiring users to log in before making purchases or accessing certain features.

- Product Reviews: Users can write and read product reviews, helping other users make informed purchasing decisions.

- Admin Panel: The website includes an admin panel for managing products, categories, orders, and users. Only authorized administrators can access the admin panel.

- Responsive Design: The website is responsive and mobile-friendly, ensuring a seamless experience across different devices and screen sizes.

## Technologies Used
- Business manager: Salesforce commerce cloud
- Front-end: HTML, CSS, JavaScript
- Back-end: Node.js
- Payment Integration:  PayPal, Openpay, mercadopago, or any other popular payment gateway.

And of course it has a [private repository] on GitHub.

## Deploy


## Productive project location
[Mens Fashion](https://www.mensfashion.com.mx/)

## Contribution
If you want to contribute to this project, request permission, create a new branch, and submit a pull request with your changes. Follow the existing code style and send meaningful commit messages.

## Contact Information
If you have any questions, suggestions, or issues, please contact the project owner at miguel@puntocommerce.com.
